name: Beetroot
properties: Drinking beet juice can reduce blood pressure in short term. Beetroots high levels of inorganic nitrate caused a reduction in blood pressure.

name: Blueberries
properties: Blueberries contain antioxidant compounds called anthocyanins. People who eat blueberry regularly reduce the risk of high blood pressure.

name: Kiwi
properties: Kiwis are rich in vitamin C, which may significantly improve blood pressure.

name: Garlic
properties: The active ingredient is allicin. Garlic increases the body's production of nitric oxide, which helps the smooth muscles to relax and the blood vessels to dilate. These changes can reduce hypertension.

name: Black Gram Lentils(Urad Dal)
properties: Excellent source of vegetarian protein and fiber. Diet rich in pulses decreased levels of blood pressure and cholesterol.

name: Pomegranate
properties: Due to its antioxidant content pomegranates lower high blood pressure in a very short period of time. Eat 1 cup pomegranate regularly.

name: Cinnamon
properties: Cinnamon may also help to reduce blood pressure, at least in the short-term.

name: Pistachio
properties: Pistachios are healthful nuts that may decrease hypertension. This may be because a compound in the nuts reduces the tightness of blood vessels.
